p: Parkinsons disease (PD) is a systemic disease that exhibits not only motor symptoms but also various non-motor symptoms during its course. [ 1â€“ 3] Because of the limitations of L-dopa and other drug therapies, other treatment modalities such as device-aided therapy have been attempted, [ 4] but at least in the case of deep brain stimulation, several side effects such as voice and speech disorders have been identified as problems. [ 5] Furthermore, none of the available treatments have been able to modify the course of the disease.
